attributes.action: Create a definitive and productive tax incentives for persons to ride and to register to ride a bicycle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The above petition is asking the Prime Minister to look at ways to encourage the people of the U.K. to ride cycles as part of an integrated transport system.  Rather than road pricing let's look at road discounting.  E.G.  If you ride your bike to work everyday the government will discount you road tax by a set amount yearly.  This can  be regulated by an easy registration scheme with your employer.  The more people that ride to his work the less tax he pays.  These are fundamentally sound ideas what do you think?
